com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample

Class SampleDataStageDataFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample.SampleDataStageDataFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStageDataFormatIF

    public class SampleDataStageDataFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStageDataFormatIF
    Format the data suitable for the DataStage sequential file reader and column importer stages.

        Specified by:
        formatNullImage in interface DataStageDataFormatIF

        image - full row image
        Returns:
